added.title: Add Romaji and Hiragana transliteration for Japanese
added.desc: Settings -> Transliteration -> select Romaji/Hiragana for Japanese subtitle

added.title: Add Pinyin transliteration for Chinese
added.desc: Settings -> Transliteration -> select Pinyin for Chinese subtitle

added.title: Detailed Translation (available for English subtitle or English translation at the moment)
added.desc:
Want to learn more about a word?
Right-click on the word, and we'll show detailed translation for you.
You can learn synonyms of the word from the reverse translation.

added.title: Hiding sidebar
added.desc: You can now hide the sidebar by clicking the button on the upper right corner of videos
